title: Stay
lyrics: hợp âm chia ở tone Waiting for the time to pass you by Hope the winds of change will change your mind I could give a thousand reasons why And I know you, And you've got to Make it on your own but we don't have to grow up, we could stay forever young Living on my sofa, drinking rum and cola, underneath the rising sun I could give a thousand reasons why But you're going And you know that All you have to is stay A minute Just take your time The clock is ticking, so stay All you have to do is wait A second Your hands are mine The clock is ticking, so stay Won't admit what I already know I've never been the best at letting go I don't want to spend the night alone Guess I need you And I need to Make it on your own but we don't have to grow up, we could stay forever young Living on my sofa, drinking rum and cola, underneath the rising sun I could give a thousand reasons why But you're going And you know that All you have to is stay A minute Just take your time The clock is ticking, so stay All you have to do is wait A second Your hands are mine The clock is ticking, so stay all you have to do is stay so stay, yeah All you have to is stay A minute Just take your time The clock is ticking, so stay All you have to do is wait A second Your hands are mine The clock is ticking, so stay
